sentences.sContent: Did you ever get the pictures developed ?
sentences.sCn: 你到底有没有把照片冲洗出来？

sentences.sContent: ...Even major fossil fuel exporting countries have great potential to develop renewable energies...
...They try to develop their skills through close supervision and organized activities...
...there is reason to continue to use and develop them to help meet the enormous challenge of Sustainably feeding a growing planet...
...and we need to develop a set of principles to guide our everyday behavior and make sure that tech is improving and not hindering our mental processes...
...and if you live at home you need to develop the same kind of independence you'd have if you were living away...
...in which they develop the wide range of complex reasoning abilities required of good lawyers...
...In order to develop the musical ability of their children...
...Happiness will be achieved only when we show great courage to confront problems and develop the capacity to solve them...
...American politicians will have to develop the courage to follow what is taught in all American public-policy schools: that there are good taxes and bad taxes...

synos.tran: 开发；进步；使成长；使显影

phrases.pContent: torch program（a plan to develop new and high technology）
phrases.pCn: 火炬计划（开发高新科技的一项计划）

words.tran: 发达的（国家或地区）；成熟的
发展；开发；发育；住宅小区（专指由同一开发商开发的）；[摄] 显影

trans.tranOther: to make a photograph out of a photographic film, using chemicals
